name: auto-fold
description: Auto fold/unfold contents on any language

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.build: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production && vsce package

auto-fold.fold/unfold-imports-when-focus.description: When import section is focused, unfold all imports. When import section is blurred, fold all imports.

auto-fold.enable-str-search-imports-for-.description: Enable string search for imports in JavaScript files. This is not the default behavior of VSCode. But the default behavior of vscode sometime does not work. So this is enabled by default.
